RemediationStrings.Title: The Netskope client service must be running. Value discovered was {ActualValue}.
RemediationStrings.Description: Your device must have the Netskope client service running and enabled. Try restarting your device, and then follow the steps here: https://docs.netskope.com/en/netskope-client-troubleshooting-guide/. If you do this and get this message again, contact Corporate IT at itsupport@intelycare.com.

RemediationStrings.Title: The Netskope client service startup must be set to Automatic. Value discovered was {ActualValue}.
RemediationStrings.Description: Your device must have the Netskope client service startup set to Automatic. Try restarting your device, and then follow the steps here: https://docs.netskope.com/en/netskope-client-troubleshooting-guide/. If you do this and get this message again, contact Corporate IT at itsupport@intelycare.com.
